short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tag, filter, and customize your LinkedIn feed. Show what matters, hide what doesn't.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fed up with the chaos of your LinkedIn feed? 
LIPHT is here to help.

LIPHT lets you:
✔️ See posts from the people and topics you care about.
✔️ Reduce noise and clutter by removing irrelevant posts, such as promoted content.
✔️ Switch between feeds tailored to your different needs

No more wading through low-quality posts to find the good stuff. 
LIPHT puts you in control, giving you a clean, relevant feed with just a few clicks.

Key Features:
✓ Your Feed.Your Rules.
Take control of your feed with granular settings. Hide promotional content, filter by connection degree, and customize your experience exactly how you want it.

✓ Fit Your Feed To Your Needs
See posts from your favorite tech voices when learning; Switch to startup founders when seeking inspiration; Focus on investors when looking for funding.
